original_title: Sammy Hagar & the Circle Live: At Your Service
overview: Recorded Live on tour 2014. The Circle features Michael Anthony, the renowned rhythm section bassist who has played with Sammy for the last 30 years in bands including Van Halen and Chicken Foot. Vic Johnson, Hagar's longtime guitar virtuoso who seamlessly shreds through his own, as well as some of rocks most iconic guitarist's riffs. Jason Bonham, the acclaimed drummer and son of iconic Led Zeppelin drummer, John Bonham.
title: Sammy Hagar & the Circle Live: At Your Service
